typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		box as string,
		jobs__name as string,
		jobs__script as string,
		jobs__query as string,
		jobs__table__name as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> BoxJobMap
source(output(
		ID as integer,
		Name as string,
		HasTDExtraction as boolean,
		Status as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> BoxesTable
source(output(
		{Job Name} as string,
		Status as string,
		{Is TD Extract box} as string,
		{TD extract job 1} as string,
		{TD extract job 2} as string,
		{BQ Dataset} as string,
		{BQ Tables} as string,
		{TD Tables} as string,
		prerequisite_1 as string,
		prerequisite_2 as string,
		prerequisite_3 as string,
		prerequisite_4 as string,
		prerequisite_5 as string,
		prerequisite_6 as string,
		prerequisite_7 as string,
		prerequisite_8 as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> BoxList
BoxJobMap derive(each(match(type=='string'), $$ = trim($$))) ~> CleanData
CleanData, BoxesTable join(box == Name,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> JoinBoxes
SelectJobData alterRow(upsertIf(true())) ~> UpsertJobs
BoxList select(mapColumn(
		JobName = {Job Name},
		TDExtractJob1 = {TD extract job 1},
		TDExtractJob2 = {TD extract job 2}
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectTDExtractionJobs
SelectTDExtractionJobs unpivot(output(
		TDExtractionJob as string,
		TDExtractJob1 as string,
		TDExtractJob2 as string
	),
	ungroupBy(JobName),
	lateral: true,
	ignoreNullPivots: true) ~> UnpivotJobColumns
JoinBoxes, UnpivotJobColumns lookup(trim(jobs__name) == trim(TDExtractJob1),
	multiple: false,
	pickup: 'any',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> LookupTDExtractionJob
LookupTDExtractionJob derive(IsTDExtraction = case(not(isNull(TDExtractJob1)), true(), false())) ~> GenIsTDExtraction
GenIsTDExtraction select(mapColumn(
		BoxID = ID,
		Name = jobs__name,
		ScriptName = jobs__script,
		QueryName = jobs__query,
		TableName = jobs__table__name,
		IsTDExtraction
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectJobData
UpsertJobs sink(input(
		ID as integer,
		Name as string,
		BoxId as integer,
		ScriptName as string,
		QueryName as string,
		IsTDExtraction as boolean
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:true,
	format: 'table',
	mapColumn(
		Name,
		BoxId = BoxID,
		ScriptName,
		QueryName,
		IsTDExtraction
	),
	partitionBy('hash', 1),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError') ~> SinkJobsTable
